        public GUI getInventory(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getInventoryEvents

        public java.util.ArrayList<InvEvent> getInventoryEvents(GUI inv)
        Parameters:
        inv - inventory that you are getting the events of
        Returns:

      • onInventoryClick

        public void onInventoryClick(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
